results.title: Perindopril/amlodipine-induced thrombotic microangiopathy
results.text_hl: Very seldom @CHEMICAL_Perindopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020913 @@@perindopril@@@/@<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ may cause @<m>DISEASE_Hematologic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006402 @@@hematologic abnormalities@@@, probably through an immunological mechanism, but there were no reports of causing @DISEASE_Thrombotic_Microangiopathies @DISEASE_MESH:D057049 @@@TMA@@@ so far.

citations.NLM: Periša V, Laslo D, Maričić L, Zibar L. Perindopril/amlodipine-induced thrombotic microangiopathy Turk J Emerg Med. 2021 Jan-Mar;21(1):38-41. PMID: 33575515

results.title: Efficacy and Safety of Yangxue Qingnao Pills Combined with Amlodipine in Treatment of Hypertensive Patients with Blood Deficiency and Gan-Yang Hyperactivity: A Multicenter, Randomized Controlled Trial.

results.title: Amlodipine besylate/olmesartan medoximil fixed combination for the treatment of hypertension.
results.text_hl: In a large, randomized, placebo-controlled study (Combination of @CHEMICAL_Olmesartan_Medoxomil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068557 @@@Olmesartan medoxomil@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine besylate@@@ in Controlling High @<m>DISEASE_Hematologic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006402 @@@blood@@@ pressure [COACH]) of 1940 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@, the high-dose combinations of @CHEMICAL_Olmesartan_Medoxomil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068557 @@@olmesartan medoxomil@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine besylate@@@ 40/10 mg/day reduced the sitting systolic and diastolic @<m>DISEASE_Hematologic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006402 @@@blood@@@ pressure by 29/19 mmHg from baseline (p < 0.001) and resulted in 54% of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ achieving @<m>DISEASE_Hematologic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006402 @@@blood@@@ pressure goals.

citations.NLM: Chrysant SG. Amlodipine besylate/olmesartan medoximil fixed combination for the treatment of hypertension. Expert Rev Cardiovasc Ther. 2009 Aug;7(8):887-95. PMID: 19673666
citations.BibTeX: @article{19673666, title={Amlodipine besylate/olmesartan medoximil fixed combination for the treatment of hypertension.}, author={Chrysant SG}, journal={Expert Rev Cardiovasc Ther}, volume={7}, number={8}, pages={887-95}}

results.title: A comparison of amlodipine with enalapril in the treatment of moderate/severe hypertension.
results.text_hl: Although the reduction in @<m>DISEASE_Hematologic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006402 @@@blood@@@ pressure was greater for the @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ treated group, the differences between treatments were not statistically significant. 6.

citations.NLM: Fowler G, Webster J, Lyons D, Witte K, Crichton WA, Jeffers TA, Wickham EA, Sanghera SS, Cornish R, Petrie JC. A comparison of amlodipine with enalapril in the treatment of moderate/severe hypertension. Br J Clin Pharmacol. 1993 May;35(5):491-8. PMID: 8512761

results.title: A diuretic is more effective than a beta-blocker in hypertensive patients not controlled on amlodipine and lisinopril.
results.text_hl: The results show that in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ whose @<m>DISEASE_Hematologic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006402 @@@blood@@@ pressures are not controlled by the combination of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Lisinopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, the addition of @CHEMICAL_Bendroflumethiazide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001539 @@@bendrofluazide@@@ 5 mg once daily causes a significant fall in @<m>DISEASE_Hematologic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006402 @@@blood@@@ pressure compared with placebo and a significantly greater fall than 100 mg @CHEMICAL_Atenolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ once daily.

citations.NLM: Antonios TF, Cappuccio FP, Markandu ND, Sagnella GA, MacGregor GA. A diuretic is more effective than a beta-blocker in hypertensive patients not controlled on amlodipine and lisinopril. Hypertension. 1996 Jun;27(6):1325-8. PMID: 8641743

results.title: Adding Hydrochlorothiazide to Olmesartan/Amlodipine Increases Efficacy in Patients With Inadequate Blood Pressure Control on Dual-Combination Therapy
results.text_hl: Adding @CHEMICAL_Hydrochlorothiazide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006852 @@@Hydrochlorothiazide@@@ to @CHEMICAL_olmesartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:C437965 @@@Olmesartan@@@/@<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ Increases Efficacy in @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ With Inadequate @<m>DISEASE_Hematologic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006402 @@@Blood@@@ Pressure Control on Dual-Combination Therapy

citations.NLM: Rump LC, Ammentorp B, Laeis P, Scholze J. Adding Hydrochlorothiazide to Olmesartan/Amlodipine Increases Efficacy in Patients With Inadequate Blood Pressure Control on Dual-Combination Therapy J Clin Hypertens (Greenwich). 2016 Jan;18(1):60-9. PMID: 26176708

results.title: Role of valsartan, amlodipine and hydrochlorothiazide fixed combination in blood pressure control: an update
results.text_hl: Inclusion of a diuretic in the triple combination is based on the evidence that these agents are effective and cheap, enhance the effect of other antihypertensive agents, and add a specific effect to individuals with salt-sensitivity of @<m>DISEASE_Hematologic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006402 @@@blood@@@ pressure. The benefit of triple combination therapy with @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, @CHEMICAL_Valsartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068756 @@@valsartan@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Hydrochlorothiazide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006852 @@@hydrochlorothiazide@@@ over its dual component therapies has been demonstrated, and the use of a single pill will simplify therapy resulting in better @<m>DISEASE_Hematologic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006402 @@@blood@@@ pressure control.

citations.NLM: Destro M, Cagnoni F, D'Ospina A, Ricci AR, Demichele E, Peros E, Zaninelli A, Preti P. Role of valsartan, amlodipine and hydrochlorothiazide fixed combination in blood pressure control: an update Vasc Health Risk Manag. 2010 Apr 15;6():253-60. PMID: 20407632
citations.BibTeX: @article{20407632, title={Role of valsartan, amlodipine and hydrochlorothiazide fixed combination in blood pressure control: an update}, author={Destro M and Cagnoni F and D'Ospina A and Ricci AR and Demichele E and Peros E and Zaninelli A and Preti P}, journal={Vasc Health Risk Manag}, volume={6}, pages={253-60}}

results.title: Synergism of irbesartan and amlodipine on hemodynamic amelioration and organ protection in spontaneously hypertensive rats.
results.text_hl: AIM: To investigate the synergism of low-doses of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Irbesartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077405 @@@irbesartan@@@ on reduction of @<m>DISEASE_Hematologic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006402 @@@blood@@@ pressure variability (BPV), amelioration of baroreflex sensitivity (BRS) and organ protection in spontaneously @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ (SHR).

results.title: Selective imidazoline agonist moxonidine in obese hypertensive patients.
results.text_hl: Our results showed that @CHEMICAL_moxonidine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C043482 @@@moxonidine@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ significantly reduced @<m>DISEASE_Hematologic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006402 @@@blood@@@ pressure when measured using the oscillometric method and 24-hour @<m>DISEASE_Hematologic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006402 @@@blood@@@ pressure monitoring.

results.title: Long-term effects of angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors and calcium antagonists on the right and left ventricles in essential hypertension.
results.text_hl: Both drugs significantly reduced @<m>DISEASE_Hematologic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006402 @@@blood@@@ pressure, casual or monitored (p < 0.01), and left ventricular mass index (from 125 +/- 32 to 100 +/- 12 gm/m2 [p < 0.02] with @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and from 106 +/- 18 to 89 +/- 10 gm/m2 [p < 0.02] with @CHEMICAL_Fosinopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017328 @@@fosinopril@@@).

citations.NLM: Lombardo M, Alli C, Broccolino M, Ferrari S, Montemurro L, Zaini G, Zanni D. Long-term effects of angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors and calcium antagonists on the right and left ventricles in essential hypertension. Am Heart J. 1997 Sep;134(3):557-64. PMID: 9327716
